City Council
============

Overview
The
[City Charter (PDF)](https://www.rockdaletx.gov/DocumentView.aspx?DID=26 "City Charter link")
provides for a Council-Manager form of government where the
[city manager](https://www.rockdaletx.gov/81/City-Manager "City Manager link")
is responsible to the City Council. The Charter provides for a Mayor and six Council Members with the Mayor being elected at-large. Three Council Members are elected from the east ward and three Council Members are elected from the west ward.

The Mayor, or in his/her absence the Mayor Pro-Tem, is the presiding officer at City Council meetings but may only vote in case of a tie vote among Council Members. The Mayor and each Council Member serve three-year staggered terms and there are no term limits. The City Charter prohibits salaries for the Mayor or Council Members but they may be reimbursed for their expenses related to their Council service.

The responsibilities of the City Council include but are not limited to the following:

* Adopting the annual budget
* Adopting, amending or repealing
  [ordinances](https://www.rockdaletx.gov/41/Codes-Ordinances "Codes and Orrdinances link")
  and resolutions
* Adopt, modify and carry out plans for development proposed by the
  [Planning and Zoning Commission](https://www.rockdaletx.gov/105/Planning-and-Zoning-Commission "Planning and Zoning Commission link")
* Approve
  [fees](https://www.rockdaletx.gov/DocumentCenter/View/4967/Fee-schedule-Ammended-2142024)
  for services

* Second Monday of each month
* City Hall
  505 W Cameron Avenue
  Rockdale, TX 76567

Meeting information and agendas are posted at least 72 hours in advance at City Hall, except in emergencies. To request for an item to be placed on an agenda, please submit a completed
[Request for Placement on Agenda Form (PDF)](https://www.rockdaletx.gov/DocumentView.aspx?DID=62 "Request for Placement on Agenda Form")
to the
[city secretary](https://www.rockdaletx.gov/88/City-Secretary "city secretary")
by noon on the Monday a week prior to the regularly scheduled meeting. Download a copy of the
[Council Rules and Procedures (PDF)](https://www.rockdaletx.gov/DocumentView.aspx?DID=481 "Council Rules and Procedures")
.

Members
View the City Council's
[current members and membership requirements](https://www.rockdaletx.gov/96/Members "current members and membership requirements")
.
